title: Bundle of Joy (Christmas Is For Kids #2)
description: AT SIX O'CLOCK. . .the door slammed shut, trapping boutique owner Caroline Bradley and short-order cook Charlie Donohue in a fur vault.At seven . . . their relationship sank to an all-time low, as Caroline blamed Charlie, and Charlie tried brute strength against the unyielding door.At nine . . . the temperature plummeted and Caroline and Charlie wrapped themselves in luxurious fur to keep warm.At ten . . . Caroline noticed the masculine muscles in Charlie's back, and he compared her dimple to a work of art.At eleven . . . Charlie couldn't tear his eyes from Caroline's inviting mouth, while she fantasized about his kisses.Just after midnight. . . the light blew--and under cover of darkness, Caroline and Charlie found paradise.
author: Barbara Bretton
